title: Gravelord Azir = The Lich King???

embed.description: The Lich King is the master and lord of the Scourge, which he rules telepathically from the Frozen Throne atop the Icecrown Glacier. Kil'jaeden created the Lich King from the spirit of the orcish shaman Ner'zhul to raise an undead army to conquer Azeroth for the Burning Legion.

body: Am i the only one that sees a striking resemblance between the new azir skin and The lich king???

replies.body:
This is what I thought when I first saw his Load Screen picture hahahahahaha.

He honestly looks like the Lich King thematically and stylistically.
Thank you!! my mates have been saying im crazy

I've never played WOW, but I thought he looked like the Witch King of Angmar from LOTR.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/lotr/images/6/6e/Witch_King.png/revision/latest?cb=20120303233955

Infact the splash art looks a lot like the [Battle of Pelennor Feilds ](http://lotr.wikia.com/wiki/Battle_of_the_Pelennor_Fields) from Return of the King (3rd movie). It wouldn't really be a surprise since we already have Veigar Greybeard (Gandalf reference).
He reminds me of Sauron from the of the rings... Idk why, maybe it is just the mask.
